keywords.value: Mind Over Money: The Psychology of Money and How to Use It Better (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

lead_paragraph: Claudia Hammond’s “Mind Over Money” shows us how to put the lessons of behavioral economics into practice when we manage our own finances.
snippet: Claudia Hammond’s “Mind Over Money” shows us how to put the lessons of behavioral economics into practice when we manage our own finances....

headline.main: Overcome Your Cash Conundrums With the Power of Psychology
